value.title: Introduction to Linux on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the unique benefits of running Linux on Azure and how to run Linux-based applications and workloads in the cloud with Azure.

images.title: Introduction to Linux on Azure

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

images.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Machine learning crash course
value.excerpt: A high-level overview of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Modules are aimed at people with little or no knowledge of computer science and statistics. You will cover the essential concepts of AI and learn how to apply custom machine learning solutions with free, easy to use tools. You will learn simple but powerful ways that AI practitioners make predictions about objects, people, and the future. Then, youâ€™ll cover exciting, complex topics you may have heard of, such as neural networks, computer vision, deep learning, and unsupervised learning.

topItems.title: Predict numeric values with regression
topItems.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

images.title: Predict numeric values with regression

topItems.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
topItems.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
Predict numeric values with regression

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to handle infrastructure and service failure, recover from the loss of data, and recover from a disaster by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

images.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

images.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Create a Docker image and store it in a repository in Azure Container Registry. Use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the Docker image. Configure continuous deployment for the web app by using a webhook that monitors the Docker image for changes.

images.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service

value.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data
value.excerpt: Learn about non-relational databases, and how they compare to relational databases. Understand the different types of non-relational databases commonly used by applications.

images.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Azure App Service enables you to build and host web applications in the programming language of your choice without managing infrastructure. Learn how to create a website through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

images.title: Host a web application with Azure App service

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.

images.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification

value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

images.title: Predict numeric values with regression

value.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn how identity and access management work in Microsoft 365.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

value.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
value.excerpt: Use the Azure Portal and Cloud Shell to provision, connect, and manage Azure SQL databases.

images.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

images.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

images.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

value.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out
value.excerpt: Respond to periods of increased activity by incrementally increasing the resources available and then, to reduce costs, decreasing these resources when activity drops.

images.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

images.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets

value.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Simplify and protect access to devices and apps with intelligent identity and access management to increase security and productivity with Microsoft 365.

images.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly.

images.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
value.excerpt: Package a web app so that it can be deployed as a Docker image and run from an Azure Container Instance.

images.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Assess the characteristics of Azure IoT Hub and determine scenarios when to use IoT Hub.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub

value.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database

value.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Learn how to run containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI).

images.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances

value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage.

images.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage

value.title: Create Intelligent Bots with the Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a chat bot and add intelligence to the Bot by integrating QnA Maker and LUIS.

topItems.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
topItems.excerpt: Bots are a popular way to provide support through multiple communication channels. This module describes how to use the QnA Maker service and Azure Bot Service to create a bot that answers user questions.

images.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with itsâ€™ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly.

images.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI.

images.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

images.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
